winterizeCabin.title: Winterize cabin
subtasks: Drain all water lines and fixtures
Add antifreeze to drains and toilets
Empty and clean refrigerator, leave door open
Close and lock all windows and shutters
Set heat to minimum (5-8°C) or drain heating system

openCabinForSummer.title: Open cabin for summer
openCabinForSummer.description: Prepare cabin for summer season after winter
subtasks: Open shutters and air out cabin
Turn on water supply and check for leaks
Test all faucets and flush toilets

serviceWoodburningStove.title: Service wood-burning stove
subtasks: Remove and dispose of ash when cool
Clean glass door with appropriate cleaner
Test door seal with paper test
Stock up on firewood if needed

scheduleChimneySweeping.title: Schedule chimney sweeping
subtasks: Provide access to fireplace and roof

checkForIceDamsAndRoofLoad.title: Check for ice dams and roof load
checkForIceDamsAndRoofLoad.description: Inspect roof for heavy snow and ice dams
subtasks: Look for icicles along eaves (sign of ice dams)
Check for sagging roof areas from snow weight
Inspect attic for water stains or moisture
Remove snow from roof if necessary (hire professional)
Check that heating cables are working

maintainHeatingCables.title: Maintain heating cables
maintainHeatingCables.description: Test and inspect heating cables on roof and gutters

cleanHRVERVSystem.title: Clean HRV/ERV system
cleanHRVERVSystem.description: Clean balanced ventilation system filters and heat exchanger
subtasks: Remove and clean or replace filters

checkForMoistureAndMold.title: Check for moisture and mold
checkForMoistureAndMold.description: Inspect for moisture problems and mold growth
subtasks: Check bathrooms and kitchen for moisture
Take photos of any problem areas

serviceDehumidifier.title: Service dehumidifier
subtasks: Clean filter with vacuum or water

inspectCrawlSpace.title: Inspect crawl space
inspectCrawlSpace.description: Check crawl space for moisture and damage
subtasks: Check for standing water or moisture
Look for signs of pests or animals

winterizeBoat.title: Winterize boat
subtasks: Flush and drain engine cooling system
Add fuel stabilizer and fill tank
Store life jackets and equipment indoors

serviceBoatForSeason.title: Service boat for season
subtasks: Check safety equipment (life jackets, fire extinguisher)
Verify registration and insurance are current

maintainPierdock.title: Maintain pier/dock
maintainPierdock.description: Inspect and repair pier or dock
subtasks: Inspect pilings and supports for rot

treatExteriorWoodSurfaces.title: Treat exterior wood surfaces
treatExteriorWoodSurfaces.description: Oil or paint wooden panels and trim
subtasks: Apply wood oil or paint as appropriate

serviceSepticSystem.title: Service septic system
subtasks: Locate and expose septic tank lid
Ask about tank condition and sludge levels

prepareSkiEquipment.title: Prepare ski equipment
prepareSkiEquipment.description: Wax skis and check bindings for season

storeSummerEquipment.title: Store summer equipment
storeSummerEquipment.description: Protect outdoor furniture and equipment for winter

maintainOutdoorLighting.title: Maintain outdoor lighting
maintainOutdoorLighting.description: Check and replace outdoor lights and sensors
subtasks: Update to LED bulbs if needed

backup.title: Database Backups
backup.description: Automatic database backups ensure your data is safe. Backups are created every hour and cleaned up automatically according to the retention policy.
backup.actionsDescription: Create a manual backup, download the current database, or run cleanup to remove old backups according to the retention policy.
backup.retentionHourly: All backups from the last 24 hours
backup.retentionDaily: Daily backups for the last 7 days
backup.retentionWeekly: Weekly backups for the last 4 weeks
backup.retentionMonthly: Monthly backups for the last 12 months
backup.confirmCleanup: Run cleanup to remove old backups according to the retention policy. This cannot be undone. Continue?
